includedAssets.title: Dark Descent
includedAssets.synopsis: Met superintendent Stella Gibson (Gillian Anderson) is sent to Belfast to review the investigation of a young woman's murder.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Met superintendent Stella Gibson (Gillian Anderson) is sent to Belfast to review the investigation of a young woman's murder.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Met superintendent Stella Gibson (Gillian Anderson) is sent to Belfast to review the investigation of a young woman's murder.

includedAssets.title: Darkness Visible
includedAssets.synopsis: As another death pushes Gibson to try and take control of the investigation, the killer's ritualistic methods are revealed.

includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As another death pushes Gibson to try and take control of the investigation, the killer's ritualistic methods are revealed.

includedAssets.title: Insolence & Wine
includedAssets.synopsis: While a frustrated Spector makes a discovery about his latest victim, Gibson learns of a troubling recent death.

includedAssets.title: My Adventurous Song
includedAssets.synopsis: While Gibson is caught in an Internal Affairs investigation, Spector's actions begin to draw attention.

includedAssets.title: The Vast Abyss
includedAssets.synopsis: While Gibson investigates a failed attack, Spector desperately attempts to cover his tracks. Series finale.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: A Met superintendent (Gillian Anderson) is sent to Belfast to oversee the investigation into a young woman's murder, while the killer (Jamie Dornan) meticulously plans his next crime. BAFTA-nominated first series of the gripping British-Irish crime drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Met superintendent Gillian Anderson heads to Belfast to work a murder case, killer Jamie Dornan plans his next move. Series one of the crime drama.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A Met superintendent (Gillian Anderson) is sent to Belfast to oversee the investigation into a young woman's murder, while the killer (Jamie Dornan) meticulously plans his next crime. BAFTA-nominated first series of the gripping British-Irish crime drama.

includedIn.title: The Fall
includedIn.synopsis: While a Met superintendent travels to Northern Ireland to investigate a murder, the killer meticulously plans his next crime.

includedIn.mediumSynopsis: While a Met superintendent travels to Northern Ireland to investigate a murder, the killer meticulously plans his next crime.
